name: HUDdled
description:
Be the dungeon master! Protect your complicated machinery from the filthy adventurers! And more importantly : master your shooting skill as it becomes more complex with your increasing power!

Use arrow keys to move, space to shoot and... other keys for other stuff...

This is our entry for LDJAM 40 ("The more you have the worse it is"). Please, leave us a rating and a comment on this site once you've played the game! https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/huddled 

Lead programming/Game Design : Yannis Attard

Chara design and animation :  Julie Heugue

Game Design/UI design/Background/Music and Sound design : Antonin Demeilliez
